resources.string:
Copyright © Abhijit Padun 2020 
 “Garhgaya Assamese” typeface designed by Abhijit Padun 
 Typing App developed by Debarshi Sonowal 
 Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com 
 Icons made by Roundicons from www.flaticon.com

This Typing App renders ancient Assamese “Garhgaya” writing style as display typeface. It is an experimental project to bring back unique identity to Assamese script by recreating digital representation of ancient “Garhgaya” style.
